partners.text: Thanks to our partners, cow happiness becomes possible. Thank you for your support and belief in our mission! To do good deeds together is in the very heart!

partners_modal.heading: Thank you for support!
partners_modal.text: Contact us and we will provide you with the necessary information

questions.opening_hours: What are the opening hours of the shelter?
questions.winter_excursion: Is it possible to visit the shelter for an excursion in winter?
questions.max_guests: What is the maximum number of people per excursion?
questions.prise: What is the reason the shelter does not have any fixed prices for excursions?
questions.kind_help: How can I help the shelter besides donating?

answers.opening_hours: The shelter is open from 10:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. every day
answers.winter_excursion: Sorry for the inconvenience, but the shelter offers excursions only from spring to autumn
answers.prise: The shelter works on a volunteer basis, we do not ask people for a fixed fee - you donate as much as you think is necessary
answers.kind_help: You can sign up for the shelter visit in advance. The shelter workers will first give you a tour and then offer a several options of shelter work to help on the spot

support.step_2: Transfer any amount to our account
support.step_3: Get confirmation and feel your involvement in good affairs
support.title: How to support us
support.text: Friends, thank you to everyone who supports the shelter, realizing the great benefit of our good work with you. Join the purchase of feed for cows to help these wonderful creatures and fill the world with positive energy.
support.card_subtitle_1: When cows are in love, they fulfill their natural function
support.card_banner_1:
We are always happy for new 
like-minded people, 
who want to become participants 
in the good and sunny moods 
broadcast by the residents of the shelter! 
 
Any amount will be your sincere 
contribution to improving 
our world.
support.card_subtitle_2: Repay any amount every month. Cows need stability and your care
support.card_banner_2:
If charity is your life's work, help provide 
the cows with everything they need, 
 even a little at a time, but regularly. 

We believe in the power of unity 
and only thanks to this faith 
we continue to stay in line!

excursion.description_1:
Art therapy with cows is a unique experience that opens visitors to the world of creativity and nature. 

 This exciting adventure takes place in a picturesque village surrounded by green meadows and mountains. Spending 30-60 minutes with our pets significantly improves guests' mental state, increases their well-being and reduces mental tension. 

 Besides the opportunity to experience interaction with nature and art, the exercise leaves warm memories of peaceful cows and beautiful landscapes. 

 These four-legged 'psychologists' are important and necessary at any time, especially in these difficult times for our country. The team is always happy to welcome new arrivals to try such an unusual therapy and participate in an animal rescue that is important to the world.
excursion.description_2:
This activity is intended for visitors who want to experience rural life, interact with animals and personally participate in their care. 

 It takes place in a beautiful village surrounded by green meadows and mountains. Our guests take care of the cows, bulls and calves themselves for 30-60 minutes: feed them, give them hay and pet them. 

 The exercise offers an opportunity to be inspired by nature and experience true satisfaction from your participation in the noble cause of helping animals. 

 We believe in and work for the best in the world! Thank you to all like-minded people for paying attention to our good deeds!
excursion.description_3:
How old are you? Too old or not old enough? You will never be more interested in an exciting adventure! 

 Visit our shelter in a scenic village to see green meadows and mountains and interact with our pets. After 30-60 minutes of engaging with cows, your mental state will improve, your well-being will increase, and your anxiety will decrease. 

 The exercise provides an opportunity to experience peace and inspiration from the surrounding landscape and cows. So don't hesitate to call and register for an excursion - we look forward to seeing you. 

 We are grateful to all like-minded people for their help. We believe in the power of kindness and love that motivates intelligent people to help animals!

order_modal.title: Order an excursion!
order_modal.text: Contact us and we will provide you with the information you need

reviews.review_1: A great opportunity to spend time with the family in nature, it’s cool that you may visit the cows, there is a place to spend the night and rest nearby, added to they feed deliciously
reviews.review_2: We were passing through and decided to stop by the shelter, respect the team for the idea, the animals are comfortable, and that's the main thing! Friends we invite you to visit the shelter and donate  to support
reviews.review_3: Cool, I liked it a lot ❤️❤️❤️ a lot of ​​emotions and photos)
reviews.review_4: I recommend everyone who might join the activities of the shelter by volunteering, financially, or just spending time with the animals!
reviews.review_5: I visited the shelter with a family of 4 and had the most pleasant impressions, the children were delighted! In the conditions of war, it's a great place to recharge! We recommend it to everyone!
reviews.review_6: I recommend everyone to visit the village of Busha, besides nature and history, there is a shelter for cows, an interesting place, I didn't know before that such a thing existed in Ukraine
reviews.review_7: Cool experience, I've never been to a shelter for cows, shelters for cats and dogs are more common, horned animals need care too
reviews.review_8: We are from Vinnytsia and didn't even know that there was such a cool place nearby, we recommend visiting Busha
reviews.review_9: Rest for soul! Each of God's creatures carries kindness and love, they must be helped.

about_us.main_text: Healthy Life is a cow protection shelter whose activities aim to maintain and restore the cow population based on protected, spiritual and moral principles, to replace agricultural consumers.

s1.p1: The protection of cows from all kinds of violence is very important. When cows are in conditions of love and care, they maximally realize their natural function laid down by the Almighty to organize the surrounding space at the energy level.
s1.p2: With faith in a bright future and not looking at the difficult conditions in the country, the shelter of cows and bulls Healthy Life continues to strive to fill the world with goodness, and positive emotions and to give people the opportunity to visit the shelter and receive the psycho-emotional relief that is needed today from interaction with the shelter's residents!

s2.p1: The properties of cows, bulls, and calves that live a non-violent life have a powerful positive effect on the psycho-emotional state of people. In connection with the hostilities, people from under shelling began to come to our shelter; people in difficult emotional states, who were forced to leave their homes and cities. Adults bring children. After 30-60 minutes of contact with our wards, people's morale changes radically, psychological tension decreases and the general condition improves. Horned 'psychologists' are important and needed at all times, and now, in such a difficult time for Ukraine, they are extremely necessary. Our healthy team is always happy to have new like-minded people in the creation and development of such an important cause for the good of the world.

s3.p1: The shelter has a charitable basis, not a commodity-economic one, and from the very beginning it was created and existed solely with the funds of the family and a few like-minded people.
s3.p2: We greatly appreciate the support of our partners and helpers who, despite difficult times, provide support to the shelter.
s3.p3: The shelter has a charitable basis, not a commodity-economic one, and from the very beginning it was created and existed solely with the funds of the family and a few like-minded people.

s1.p1: The protection of cows from all kinds of violence is very important. When cows are in conditions of love and care, they maximally realize their natural function given by the Almighty to organize the surrounding space at the energy level.
s1.p2: With faith in a bright future and despite the difficult conditions in the country, the shelter for cows and bulls Healthy Life continues to strive to fill the world with goodness, positive emotions and to give people the opportunity by visiting the shelter to get such a necessary psycho-emotional release from interaction with the shelter's residents !

s2.p1: The properties of cows, bulls, and calves that live a non-violent life have a powerful positive effect on the psycho-emotional state of people. After 30-60 minutes of contact with our wards, people's morale changes radically, psychological tension decreases and the general condition improves.
s2.p2: Horned 'psychologists' are important and needed at all times, and now, in such a difficult time for Ukraine, they are extremely necessary. Our strong team is always happy to have new like-minded people in the creation and development of such an important cause for the good of the world.

s3.p1: The shelter has a charitable basis, not a commodity-economic one, and from the very beginning it was created and existed solely with the funds of the family and a few like-minded people. Every conscious person can participate in the purchase of fodder for the shelter to provide cows and bulls with comfortable conditions life to a deep happy old age.
s3.p2: We are grateful to our partners and like-minded people for every hryvnia of help and we believe in the forces of kindness and love that motivate smart people not to let shelter wards perish from hunger.
